summary: A boy growing up in Dublin during the 1980s escapes his strained family life by starting a band to impress the mysterious girl he likes.
cast: Ferdia Walsh-Peelo|Kelly Thornton|Maria Doyle Kennedy|Jack Reynor|Aidan Gillen|Ian Kenny|Ben Carolan|Percy Chamburuka|Mark McKenna|Don Wycherley|Des Keogh|Kian Murphy|Dolores Mullally|Lucy Boynton|Marcella Plunkett|Vera Nwabuwe|Conor Hamilton|Karl Rice|Tony Doyle|Keith McErlean|Peter Campion|Lydia McGuinness|Kyle Bradley Donaldson|Paul Gibbons|Eva-Jane Gaffney|Paul Roe
keywords: bullying|brother brother relationship|falling in love|teenage boy|dublin ireland
title: Sing Street
